section.heading: Marriages void from date of decree; age of consent.
section.text: The following marriages in said District shall be illegal, and shall be void from the time when their nullity shall be declared by decree, namely:

para.text: The marriage of a person adjudged to be, or to have been at the time a marriage was performed, unable by reason of mental incapacity to give valid consent to marriage;
Any marriage the consent to which of either party has been procured by force or fraud;
When either of the parties is under the age of consent, which is hereby declared to be 16 years of age.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 16-903 and § 46-401.

annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 17-222 rewrote par. (1) and repealed par. (3).
